interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SAMYANG ABOUTME Red Recipe Super Cleansing Balm 3.04 oz. (90ml) - Soft Melting Milk Texture Makeup Cleansing Balm, Mineral Contained Nourishing & Soothing Cleansing, Rose Scented
Review Date: 2020/01/20
Store: Samyang
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.66 x 3.39 x 2.36 inches; 5.57 Ounces'}
Review Text: Comes with a small spatula to scoop the product out and apply on the skin. Cleanses make-up well, just simply rub it on the spot and wash it off with water. The rosy fragrance is very pleasant and relaxing. Tested out with black eye-shadow and dark lipbalm and it took them right off with just a small amount applied to the skin.
Review Title: Rose-like scent and cleanse like a magic
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
MOSTORY 3 in 1 Eyebrow Pencil - Super Model Perfect Brow Stylist Waterproof Brown Eye Brow Makeup Long Lasting Professional Soft Powder Pen Brush (MEDIUM BROWN)
MOSTORY
{'Brand': 'MOSTORY', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 1 x 0.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces'}
This is a warm color eyebrow pencil, it glides out smoothly and very easy to apply. It feels more red than the picture of product, for someone with darker eyebrows like me might need to blend in with another dark color to make it natural. I like the weight of this pencil, it feels nice to grab in palm when using. The fine tip works well to fill in the blank and the powder adds natural final touch.
Smooth eyebrow pencil with rich color
SAMYANG ABOUTME Red Recipe Super Cleansing Balm 3.04 oz. (90ml) - Soft Melting Milk Texture Makeup Cleansing Balm, Mineral Contained Nourishing & Soothing Cleansing, Rose Scented
Samyang
{'Package Dimensions': '3.66 x 3.39 x 2.36 inches; 5.57 Ounces'}
Comes with a small spatula to scoop the product out and apply on the skin. Cleanses make-up well, just simply rub it on the spot and wash it off with water. The rosy fragrance is very pleasant and relaxing. Tested out with black eye-shadow and dark lipbalm and it took them right off with just a small amount applied to the skin.
Rose-like scent and cleanse like a magic
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Product Type:** Strongly favors makeup products with a new interest in makeup removers, highlighting a desire for effective cleansing solutions.
- **Color Preference:** Prefers warm tones but also seeks versatility for darker hair, maintaining a balance between aesthetic preferences and practicality.
- **Application Experience:** Values ease of use and smooth application not only in cosmetics but now also in cleansing products, indicating a preference for user-friendly formulations.
- **Performance Features:** Maintain a strong preference for waterproof and long-lasting formulas in makeup, while also appreciating effective cleansing capabilities in makeup removers.
- **Sensory Experience:** Enjoys products with pleasant sensory attributes, as demonstrated by a preference for products with relaxing fragrances, illustrating an interest in the overall experience of use.
- **Detail Orientation:** Focused on fine details in application, now extending to the cleansing process, ensuring thorough removal with minimal effort.
- **Review Behavior:** Continues to demonstrate a practical approach to product evaluation, rating based on effectiveness, utility, and sensory experience rather than brand loyalty, showcasing a thoughtful approach to both makeup and cleansing products.

Overall, the user exhibits a refined and comprehensive approach to makeup and skincare, seeking quality, functionality, and a pleasing sensory experience in all products.
